text:
About 13 sovereigns of gold jewels were stolen from the house of a farmer near Kannamangalam.

Farmer Gnanavel’s house is located in Arani Road in Pudupalayam Maniyakkaran Kuttai.

He and his family were asleep on Tuesday night. It is said that the burglars had allegedly gained entry into the house from the rear door.

They made away with 13 sovereigns of gold jewels. The family came to know about this in the morning and registered a complaint with the Kannamangalam police station. – Staff Reporter
title: 13 sovereigns stolen from farmer’s home
